s:scufl.s:workflowdescription:
More information is available from http://symba.sf.net
This webservice is used within SyMBA to assign LSIDs at the time of deposition into the FuGE-based database. However, it is agnostic to the type of use, and can be used, as shown here, to generate LSIDs within the cisban.cisbs.org domain for any purpose.
By checking-out SyMBA from Subversion from the above link, you can easily build your own version of this webservice with a different authority identification to have your own lightweight LSID assigner. SyMBA does much more than just provide some LSID services: it's a FuGE database, web interface, and API for loading and sharing FuGE-structured data and metadata for the life sciences. Contact us at symba-devel@lists.sourceforge.net or stop by the website for more information.

s:processor.name: assignLSID
s:processor.s:description:
Method to generate an LSID. You may specify the namespace identification as an argument to this method, and you will get back a string of the LSID with "cisban.cisbs.org" as the authority identification and a random UUID for the object identification.
http://symba.sf.net
